message.body: Alan and I picked up something bad last night at dinner. I've been up for the past few hours, and I'm still feeling sick, so I think I should rest up.
Thanks for your understanding. Please email or call if needed.
Oh no! I hope you're able to get some rest and feel better soon!
Thanks! Hope you're feeling better yourself. Have a good day.
Thank you! I'm def feeling better than yesterday...all drugged up and ready for work haha. Have a good weekend!
